Lines 1-106 of 106 from /Users/chrisreeves/Development/keepwatch-web/README.md:
# KeepWatch

A modern SaaS telemetry platform for monitoring your application systems, uptime, and logs. KeepWatch provides real-time insights into your infrastructure health, helping you stay ahead of issues before they impact your users.

## About

KeepWatch is designed to give you comprehensive visibility into your applications and systems. Whether you're running microservices, monoliths, or serverless architectures, KeepWatch helps you:

- **Monitor System Uptime** - Track availability and performance metrics across all your services
- **Application Telemetry** - Gain deep insights into your application behavior and performance
- **Log Management** - Receive, aggregate, and analyze application and system logs in real-time
- **Instant Alerts** - Get notified immediately when things go wrong

## Tech Stack

Built with modern web technologies:

- ‚ö°Ô∏è React Router with server-side rendering
- üîí TypeScript for type safety
- üé® TailwindCSS for styling
- üöÄ Vite for fast builds and HMR

## Design System

### Color Palette

Our brand colors create a professional and modern aesthetic:

- **Primary Dark** - `#001542` - Deep navy blue for headers and important elements
- **Brand Color** - `#085454` - Teal/cyan for primary actions and brand identity
- **Neutral** - `#7A7A7A` - Gray for secondary text and subtle elements
- **Base** - `#FFFFFF` - White for backgrounds and contrast
- **Accent** - `#FFB30D` - Vibrant orange for highlights and calls-to-action

## Getting Started

### Installation

Install the dependencies:

```bash
npm install
```

### Development

Start the development server with HMR:

```bash
npm run dev
```

Your application will be available at `http://localhost:5173`.

## Building for Production

Create a production build:

```bash
npm run build
```

## Deployment

### Docker Deployment

To build and run using Docker:

```bash
docker build -t my-app .

# Run the container
docker run -p 3000:3000 my-app
```

The containerized application can be deployed to any platform that supports Docker, including:

- AWS ECS
- Google Cloud Run
- Azure Container Apps
- Digital Ocean App Platform
- Fly.io
- Railway

### DIY Deployment

If you're familiar with deploying Node applications, the built-in app server is production-ready.

Make sure to deploy the output of `npm run build`

```
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ package-lock.json (or pnpm-lock.yaml, or bun.lockb)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ build/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ client/    # Static assets
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ server/    # Server-side code
```

## Styling

This template comes with [Tailwind CSS](https://tailwindcss.com/) already configured for a simple default starting experience. You can use whatever CSS framework you prefer.

---

Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è using React Router.

Lines 1-22 of 22 from /Users/chrisreeves/Development/keepwatch-web/Dockerfile:
FROM node:20-alpine AS development-dependencies-env
COPY . /app
WORKDIR /app
RUN npm ci

FROM node:20-alpine AS production-dependencies-env
COPY ./package.json package-lock.json /app/
WORKDIR /app
RUN npm ci --omit=dev

FROM node:20-alpine AS build-env
COPY . /app/
COPY --from=development-dependencies-env /app/node_modules /app/node_modules
WORKDIR /app
RUN npm run build

FROM node:20-alpine
COPY ./package.json package-lock.json /app/
COPY --from=production-dependencies-env /app/node_modules /app/node_modules
COPY --from=build-env /app/build /app/build
WORKDIR /app
CMD ["npm", "run", "start"]

input.content:
# KeepWatch Web Repository

## Overview
KeepWatch is a modern SaaS telemetry platform for monitoring application systems, uptime, and logs. It provides real-time insights into infrastructure health, helping teams stay ahead of issues before they impact users.

## Project Information
- **Name**: keepwatch-web
- **Type**: Web Application
- **Framework**: React Router v7 with SSR
- **Language**: TypeScript

## Tech Stack

### Core Technologies
- **React Router 7.9.2** - Full-stack framework with server-side rendering
- **React 19.1.1** - UI library
- **TypeScript 5.9.2** - Type safety
- **Vite 7.1.7** - Build tool and dev server
- **TailwindCSS 4.1.13** - Utility-first CSS framework

### UI Components & Libraries
- **Radix UI** - Accessible component primitives (checkbox, label, popover, slot)
- **Lucide React** - Icon library
- **React Icons** - Additional icon set
- **class-variance-authority** - Component variant management
- **tailwind-merge** - Tailwind class merging utility

### Utilities
- **RxJS 7.8.2** - Reactive programming
- **Moment.js 2.30.1** - Date/time manipulation
- **Validator 13.15.20** - String validation
- **clsx** - Conditional class names

## Project Structure

```
keepwatch-web/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ app/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ project/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ cards/          # APIKeyCard, AlarmCard, LogCard
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ dialogs/        # CRUD dialogs for projects, API keys
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ tabs/           # Project detail tabs
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ ui/                 # Reusable UI components (button, card, input, etc.)
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AddAlarmForm.tsx
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ DashboardHeader.tsx
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ lib/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ api.ts              # API client
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ auth.server.ts      # Server-side authentication
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ utils.ts            # Utility functions
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ routes/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ home.tsx            # Dashboard/home page
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ login.tsx           # Authentication
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ signup.tsx
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ logout.tsx
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ account.settings.tsx
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ account.billing.tsx
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ project.$projectId.tsx
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ project.$projectId.logs.$logId.tsx
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ projects.invite.$inviteId.tsx
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ welcome/                # Welcome page assets
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ app.css                 # Global styles
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ root.tsx                # Root layout
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ routes.ts               # Route configuration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ public/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ favicon.ico
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .zencoder/                  # Zencoder configuration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dockerfile                  # Multi-stage Docker build
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ tsconfig.json
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ vite.config.ts
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ react-router.config.ts
```

## Key Features

### Monitoring Capabilities
- **System Uptime Monitoring** - Track availability and performance metrics
- **Application Telemetry** - Deep insights into application behavior
- **Log Management** - Real-time log aggregation and analysis
- **Instant Alerts** - Immediate notifications for issues

### Application Features
- User authentication (login/signup)
- Project management
- API key management
- Alarm/alert configuration
- Log viewing and filtering
- Account settings and billing
- Team invitations
- Dashboard with project overview

## Design System

### Color Palette
- **Primary Dark**: `#001542` - Deep navy blue for headers and important elements
- **Brand Color**: `#085454` - Teal/cyan for primary actions and brand identity
- **Neutral**: `#7A7A7A` - Gray for secondary text and subtle elements
- **Base**: `#FFFFFF` - White for backgrounds and contrast
- **Accent**: `#FFB30D` - Vibrant orange for highlights and calls-to-action

## Development

### Prerequisites
- Node.js 20+
- npm

### Scripts
```bash
npm run dev        # Start development server (http://localhost:5173)
npm run build      # Create production build
npm run start      # Start production server
npm run typecheck  # Run TypeScript type checking
```

### TypeScript Configuration
- **Target**: ES2022
- **Module**: ES2022
- **JSX**: react-jsx
- **Strict Mode**: Enabled
- **Path Alias**: `~/*` maps to `./app/*`

## Deployment

### Docker
Multi-stage Dockerfile optimized for production:
1. Development dependencies installation
2. Production dependencies installation
3. Build stage
4. Final runtime image (Node 20 Alpine)

```bash
docker build -t keepwatch-web .
docker run -p 3000:3000 keepwatch-web
```

### Supported Platforms
- AWS ECS
- Google Cloud Run
- Azure Container Apps
- Digital Ocean App Platform
- Fly.io
- Railway

### DIY Deployment
Deploy the `build/` directory output with:
- `build/client/` - Static assets
- `build/server/` - Server-side code

## Architecture

### Routing
React Router v7 file-based routing with:
- Server-side rendering (SSR)
- Nested routes
- Dynamic route parameters
- Meta tag configuration per route

### Component Organization
- **UI Components**: Reusable, accessible components in `app/components/ui/`
- **Feature Components**: Domain-specific components in `app/components/project/`
- **Route Components**: Page-level components in `app/routes/`

### API Integration
Centralized API client in `app/lib/api.ts` handling:
- Project management
- Log retrieval
- Alarm configuration
- User authentication
- Team management

## Development Workflow
1. Install dependencies: `npm install`
2. Start dev server: `npm run dev`
3. Make changes with HMR
4. Type check: `npm run typecheck`
5. Build for production: `npm run build`
6. Test production build: `npm run start`

content.text: Generated `repo.md` with comprehensive repository information including tech stack, project structure, features, design system, and deployment details.

diffs.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,5376 @@
+# KeepWatch Web Repository%0A%0A## Overview%0AKeepWatch is a modern SaaS telemetry platform for monitoring application systems, uptime, and logs. It provides real-time insights into infrastructure health, helping teams stay ahead of issues before they impact users.%0A%0A## Project Information%0A- **Name**: keepwatch-web%0A- **Type**: Web Application%0A- **Framework**: React Router v7 with SSR%0A- **Language**: TypeScript%0A%0A## Tech Stack%0A%0A### Core Technologies%0A- **React Router 7.9.2** - Full-stack framework with server-side rendering%0A- **React 19.1.1** - UI library%0A- **TypeScript 5.9.2** - Type safety%0A- **Vite 7.1.7** - Build tool and dev server%0A- **TailwindCSS 4.1.13** - Utility-first CSS framework%0A%0A### UI Components & Libraries%0A- **Radix UI** - Accessible component primitives (checkbox, label, popover, slot)%0A- **Lucide React** - Icon library%0A- **React Icons** - Additional icon set%0A- **class-variance-authority** - Component variant management%0A- **tailwind-merge** - Tailwind class merging utility%0A%0A### Utilities%0A- **RxJS 7.8.2** - Reactive programming%0A- **Moment.js 2.30.1** - Date/time manipulation%0A- **Validator 13.15.20** - String validation%0A- **clsx** - Conditional class names%0A%0A## Project Structure%0A%0A%60%60%60%0Akeepwatch-web/%0A%E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 app/%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 components/%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 project/%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 cards/          # APIKeyCard, AlarmCard, LogCard%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 dialogs/        # CRUD dialogs for projects, API keys%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%94%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 tabs/           # Project detail tabs%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 ui/                 # Reusable UI components (button, card, input, etc.)%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 AddAlarmForm.tsx%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%94%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 DashboardHeader.tsx%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 lib/%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 api.ts              # API client%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 auth.server.ts      # Server-side authentication%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%94%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 utils.ts            # Utility functions%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 routes/%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 home.tsx            # Dashboard/home page%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 login.tsx           # Authentication%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 signup.tsx%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 logout.tsx%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 account.settings.tsx%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 account.billing.tsx%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 project.$projectId.tsx%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 project.$projectId.logs.$logId.tsx%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%82   %E2%94%94%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 projects.invite.$inviteId.tsx%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 welcome/                # Welcome page assets%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 app.css                 # Global styles%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 root.tsx                # Root layout%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%94%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 routes.ts               # Route configuration%0A%E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 public/%0A%E2%94%82   %E2%94%94%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 favicon.ico%0A%E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 .zencoder/                  # Zencoder configuration%0A%E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 Dockerfile                  # Multi-stage Docker build%0A%E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 package.json%0A%E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 tsconfig.json%0A%E2%94%9C%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 vite.config.ts%0A%E2%94%94%E2%94%80%E2%94%80 react-router.config.ts%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A## Key Features%0A%0A### Monitoring Capabilities%0A- **System Uptime Monitoring** - Track availability and performance metrics%0A- **Application Telemetry** - Deep insights into application behavior%0A- **Log Management** - Real-time log aggregation and analysis%0A- **Instant Alerts** - Immediate notifications for issues%0A%0A### Application Features%0A- User authentication (login/signup)%0A- Project management%0A- API key management%0A- Alarm/alert configuration%0A- Log viewing and filtering%0A- Account settings and billing%0A- Team invitations%0A- Dashboard with project overview%0A%0A## Design System%0A%0A### Color Palette%0A- **Primary Dark**: %60#001542%60 - Deep navy blue for headers and important elements%0A- **Brand Color**: %60#085454%60 - Teal/cyan for primary actions and brand identity%0A- **Neutral**: %60#7A7A7A%60 - Gray for secondary text and subtle elements%0A- **Base**: %60#FFFFFF%60 - White for backgrounds and contrast%0A- **Accent**: %60#FFB30D%60 - Vibrant orange for highlights and calls-to-action%0A%0A## Development%0A%0A### Prerequisites%0A- Node.js 20+%0A- npm%0A%0A### Scripts%0A%60%60%60bash%0Anpm run dev        # Start development server (http://localhost:5173)%0Anpm run build      # Create production build%0Anpm run start      # Start production server%0Anpm run typecheck  # Run TypeScript type checking%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A### TypeScript Configuration%0A- **Target**: ES2022%0A- **Module**: ES2022%0A- **JSX**: react-jsx%0A- **Strict Mode**: Enabled%0A- **Path Alias**: %60~/*%60 maps to %60./app/*%60%0A%0A## Deployment%0A%0A### Docker%0AMulti-stage Dockerfile optimized for production:%0A1. Development dependencies installation%0A2. Production dependencies installation%0A3. Build stage%0A4. Final runtime image (Node 20 Alpine)%0A%0A%60%60%60bash%0Adocker build -t keepwatch-web .%0Adocker run -p 3000:3000 keepwatch-web%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A### Supported Platforms%0A- AWS ECS%0A- Google Cloud Run%0A- Azure Container Apps%0A- Digital Ocean App Platform%0A- Fly.io%0A- Railway%0A%0A### DIY Deployment%0ADeploy the %60build/%60 directory output with:%0A- %60build/client/%60 - Static assets%0A- %60build/server/%60 - Server-side code%0A%0A## Architecture%0A%0A### Routing%0AReact Router v7 file-based routing with:%0A- Server-side rendering (SSR)%0A- Nested routes%0A- Dynamic route parameters%0A- Meta tag configuration per route%0A%0A### Component Organization%0A- **UI Components**: Reusable, accessible components in %60app/components/ui/%60%0A- **Feature Components**: Domain-specific components in %60app/components/project/%60%0A- **Route Components**: Page-level components in %60app/routes/%60%0A%0A### API Integration%0ACentralized API client in %60app/lib/api.ts%60 handling:%0A- Project management%0A- Log retrieval%0A- Alarm configuration%0A- User authentication%0A- Team management%0A%0A## Development Workflow%0A1. Install dependencies: %60npm install%60%0A2. Start dev server: %60npm run dev%60%0A3. Make changes with HMR%0A4. Type check: %60npm run typecheck%60%0A5. Build for production: %60npm run build%60%0A6. Test production build: %60npm run start%60%0A
